data.content:
Many facts suggest that children are overweight and the situation is getting worse, according to the doctors.      1      .

Some people blame(责备) the fact that we are surrounded(包围) by shops selling unhealthy, fatty foods, such as fried chicken and ice cream , at low prices.      2      , then probably children would buy less take-away food．

      3      . I agree with this, because good eating habits begin early in life, long before children start to visit fast food shops. If parents often give their children fried chicken and chocolate rather than healthy food, they will go for sweet and salty foods, and children will find it hard to get rid of the habit.

There is a third reason for this situation. Children these days take very little exercise. They do not walk to school. When they get home, they sit in front of the television or their computers and play computer games.      4      . What they need is to go outside and play active games or sports.

The above are the main reasons for this problem.      5      , as well as steering them away from fast food shops and bad eating habits.
data.analysis:
1.空格处前一句说事实表明青少年肥胖的情形越来越严重，下文中开始具体介绍导致青少年肥胖的原因。空格处的句子起到了承上启下的作用，F选项复合文意。

2.本段主要介绍过多的垃圾食品商店可能导致孩子肥胖，根据前后文，此处指的是如果没有那么多销售垃圾食品的餐馆，也许孩子们就会少买一点外带食物。应选C项。

3.根据文章结构，第二至第四段分别介绍一种导致儿童肥胖的原因，本段开始介绍另一种观点，应选A项引出观点。

4.根据上下文，可以推知空格处具体介绍了沉迷于电子游戏对孩子们的不良影响，对于孩子来说是不健康的消遣。应选E项。

5.文章最后一段对全文进行总结，提出建议，D选项符合。
data.queSource: 2015~2016学年北京大兴区高一上学期期末第71~75题10分

answerOptionList.content: There is another argument that blames parents for allowing their children to become overweight
Adults are becoming fatter and unhealthier too
If there were fewer of these restaurants
Therefore we have to encourage young people to be more active
Not only is this an unhealthy pastime(消遣)，it also gives them time to eat more unhealthy food
I feel there are a number of reasons for this
It’s a good idea to allow children to eat what they choose

5.比的后项相当于分母，不能是$$0$$．

answer: $$201$$路公交车先由终点站向西偏北$$30{}^\circ $$的方向行驶$$1$$千米$$500$$到达科技馆，再向正北方向行驶$$1$$千米$$200$$米到达市中心，然后向正西方向行驶$$1$$千米$$200$$米到达人民医院，最后向正北方向行驶$$2$$千米$$400$$米到达起始站

$$201$$路公交车从起始站到人民医院用了$$8$$分钟，由人民医院到市中心用了$$9$$分钟，由市中心到科技馆用了$$8$$分钟，由科技馆到终点站用了$$5$$分钟．该路公交车单程的平均速度是多少？

data.content: $$201$$路公交车从起始站出发，先向正南方向行驶了$$2$$千米$$400$$米到达人民医院，再向正东方向行驶了$$1$$千米$$200$$米到达市中心，然后向正南方向行驶了$$1$$千米$$200$$米到达科技馆，最后向东偏南$$30{}^\circ $$的方向行驶了$$1$$千米$$500$$米到达终点站．

data.analysis:
1. 考查形容词和副词辨析。travel是动词，需要用副词修饰，排除掉B, D。根据 "You may be amazed how      1      food travels to get to your plate." 句意得知此处应该“如此远“。far是“远”

2. 考查名词辨析。A. 劣势 C. 方法 D. 联系 。根据 "For example, consumers could only buy food that farmers produced locally." 得知应该选 "disvantages"。

3. 考查形容词辨析。B. 急剧的，戏剧的 D. 可用的，可得的。根据 "We do not have to wait for spring or summer to buy strawberries or tomatoes." 得知应该选“可得的”

4. 副词辨析。根据 "The United Arab Emirates (UAE), for example, gets 85% of its food from other countries. " 得知此处 "even" 用来加强语气，表示程度。

5. 动词辨析。B. 影响。根据 "What's wrong with'food miles'? Is this not a good way of increasing international trade? " 得知人们 "food miles" 一直困扰大家。

6. 词组辨析。A. 在当时 B. 平均 C. 另外 D. 作为交换。根据句意需要选择“另外”用于补充。
data.content:
Nowadays, the food that you buy comes from many different countries. Have a look in your fridge, cupboard, and fruit bowl and check the origins（来源）of the food. Perhaps there are apples from California, lamb from New Zealand, or potatoes from Egypt? You may be amazed how      1      food travels to get to your plate. This journey, from"field to plate", is called"food miles". A food mile is the distance that food travels from the farmer's field to the person who buys the food. Nowadays, food often travels thousands of miles to get to the consumer. Why is this, and what are the effects of these long distances? 　　

In the past, farmers sold their food in the local market and the consumers did not travel long distances, because they went to their local market to buy the food. This was a good system for farmers and consumers. However, there were some      2      . For example, consumers could only buy food that farmers produced locally. They could only get food that was in season. Now, because of modern technology, food comes from all over the world. We do not have to wait for spring or summer to buy strawberries or tomatoes. They are      3      in winter if we want. Some countries have to import（进口）most of their food. This is because they have difficult climates. The United Arab Emirates (UAE), for example, gets 85% of its food from other countries.      4      food made in the UAE often uses imported materials.    

What's wrong with"food miles"? Is this not a good way of increasing international trade? I believe these"food miles" are      5      people for a number of reasons. First of all, because food travels such long distances, we need more planes, lorries and ships to move the food. This means we use more oil or petrol, so there is more pollution and more global warming.      6      , food that travels a long way is not fresh and usually not very tasty. Tomatoes, for example, are picked early and stored for their long journey. For this reason, they are usually tasteless when they get to the consumer. Local food has a better taste, and it reduces the amount of global pollution as well. We need to buy more local food.
data.queSource: 2016年上海闵行区初三一模第75~80题12分

childList.analysis:
A、$$m$$ 点所示溶液的 $$\text{pH}$$ 值小于 $$7$$，所以溶液为酸性，故错误；

B、$$n$$ 点所示溶液的 $$\text{pH}$$ 值等于 $$7$$，所以溶液中加紫色石蕊溶液，颜色宝贝，故错误；

C、$$p$$ 点所示溶液的 $$\text{pH}$$ 值大于 $$7$$，所以溶液中的溶质为 $$\text{NaCl}$$ 和 $$\text{NaOH}$$，故正确；

D、该图中 $$\text{pH}$$ 值是从小于 $$7$$ 逐渐的增大到 $$7$$，然后大于 $$7$$，所以所对应操作是将氢氧化钠滴入盐酸中，故错误；

故选：C。

answerOptionList.content: $$\text{n}$$ 点所示溶液中加紫色石蕊溶液呈红色
$$\text{p}$$ 点所示溶液中的溶质为 $$\text{NaCl}$$ 和 $$\text{NaOH}$$
该图所对应操作是将盐酸滴入氢氧化钠溶液中

childList.name: 化学方程式的含义及书写

childList.analysis: 二氧化碳和氢氧化钠反应会生成碳酸钠，碳酸钠、氢氧化钠都显碱性，检验氢氧化钠需要先检验并除去碳酸钠，实验方案是：向试管中加入过量的氯化钙溶液，若有白色沉淀生成，则溶质中含有碳酸钠；静置，取上层清液，低价酚酞，若溶液变红，则溶质中含有氢氧化钠。
answer: 向试管中加入过量的氯化钙溶液，若有白色沉淀生成，则溶质中含有碳酸钠；静置，取上层清液，低价酚酞，若溶液变红，则溶质中含有氢氧化钠。
childList.content: 实验结束后，若要确定 $$\text{A}$$ 装置的溶液中溶质的成分，请设计合理的实验方案，简要写出实验步骤、现象和结论。（提示：$$\text{N}{{\text{a}}_{2}}\text{C}{{\text{O}}_{3}}$$ 溶液呈碱性）
如图装置可作一氧化碳还原氧化铁的实验，并检验生成的气体产物。

$$\dfrac{216}{x}=\dfrac{504}{25.2\text{ kg}}$$

$$x=10.\text{8 kg}$$

答：需要消耗铝的质量是 $$10.\text{8 kg}$$。
